original_text: So Moses brought Israel from the Red sea, and they went out into the wilderness of Shur; and they went three days in the wilderness, and found no water.
korean_text: 모세가 홍해에서 이스라엘을 인도하매 그들이 나와서 수르 광야로 들어가서 거기서 사흘길을 걸었으나 물을 얻지 못하고

sentences.original_text: So Moses brought Israel from the Red sea
and they went out into the wilderness of Shur
and they went three days in the wilderness
